text: 17:12 Onger Akaba 41:9; 109:8; Jon 6:39; 13:18; 18:9; Aposel 1:20; Hibru 2:13; 1 Jon 2:19Ezɨ dughiar kɨ me ko itiba, kɨ nɨn ziamɨn gavgavimɨn men gari. Kar ziar nɨ na ganɨngizim. Kɨ bar deravɨra men garima men tav ovengezir puvatɨ. Ezɨ gumazir ovengamim, a uabɨram ovengam. Kɨ kamaghsua, nɨn Akɨnafarimɨn itir akam guizbangɨra otivam, kamaghɨn gumazir kam ovengam.
